page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The work for this block was completed in,it's entirity,by nine to thirteen year old pupils from:- 1.{Coppice Primary School,}Roper Avenue, Heanor. 2.{Heanor Mundy Street School,}Mundy Street, Heanor. 3.{Aldercar Comprehensive School, } Daltons Close, Langley Mill. All survey work, written text, photographs and their descriptions were produced by the pupils during the summer term of 1985. Difficulties encountered included the shortage of time resulting from poor organisation on the BBC's behalf; the difficulty of transport, especially for the junior schools;two schools originally involved dropping out at the last moment; and the compilation of the finished project when information came from a number of sources.
